companyName: AdvisorShares Pacific Asset Enhanced Floating Rate
description:
The investment seeks to provide a high level of current income.
 The fund seeks to achieve its investment objective by selecting a focused portfolio comprised primarily of income producing floating rate loans and floating rate debt securities. Under normal circumstances, it will invest at least 80% of its net assets (plus any borrowings for investment purposes) in floating rate loans and other floating rate debt securities and in derivatives or other instruments that have economic characteristics similar to such securities (such as swap agreements, including, but not limited to, total return swaps, credit default swaps, and interest rate swaps).
